entry.title: BREAKING: Wallets Drained In Ongoing Solana Breach
entry.summary: Solana users report that their wallets are being drained in an ongoing exploit.

entry.title: The Merge Drives Value of ETH Options Past Bitcoin
entry.summary: Sophisticated Investors Pile into Options Ahead of Ethereum's Shift to PoS

entry.title: Is This a Better Way to Do Multi-Chain Defi?
entry.summary: Rhino.fi lets you glide between chains without complex bridges or network switches. And we’re totally self-custodial, so no matter where you go, you’ll keep full privacy and control of your funds.

entry.title: Nomad Bridge Hacked With $45M Stolen
entry.summary: The Nomad bridge is being exploited, with $45M in digital assets stolen so far.

entry.title: CryptoPunk Holders Unfazed By Meebits’ Move To Add Royalties
entry.summary: Yuga Labs has implemented a 5% royalty on secondary sales of Meebits.
